column5: No he means...................  light in the loafers tutu wearing, prancing around flag waving gay!!!  Not that there's anything wrong with that.
thats what i thought
Well thats 2.30mins of my life I will never get back LOL all I can say is WHY
I think he might be able to shoot a rapids safely, that is some skill!
To each his own... Did the people clapping make anyone else laugh?  He does have talent though.
ugh.. seriously?
I kind of enjoyed the video and the soundtrack to it. Obviously there are folks that take this sort of skill and demonstration seriously.  Thanks for sharing...pretty cool!
name 3 things I never want to see again    that video  figure skating  and dancing with the stars
that guy watched way too many bill mason videos...
LOL. ditto
I thought Bill Mason could handle a canoe WOW SBK
Anybody else think he should have used a red canoe?
As someone who's paddled solo through thousands of km's of wilderness and a former ORCA certified instructor, I kept waiting for his routine to start and it never did.  That was totally gay.
the bachelor  the bachelorette  ???
Okay Mike that enough watching gay canoe videos, I wanna see some gators!!!
Been working non stop since I've been back Gord.  As per usual a large report will take me minimum 12 hours to whip off.  I need to find the time.
I am sure your busy, I was just pullin yer leg.  Your reports are always worth the wait!
I think it's the bow-tie. I've never had any reason to spin my canoe like that, but then, I've never worn a bow-tie in the canoe either.
Well if he was doing Swan Lake in a plaid shirt it would look silly also.
I hate that song.    Now I hate it more.    Please don't make me watch it again, because I don't want to go back to the asylum.    And I'm running out of places to hide the bodies.
I am assuming you mean, as in Happy,
Of course not. The term was used in the most figurative way possible.
Just Checking
so elegant and graceful!
what's he trolling for?
A very skillful and graceful paddler.
